1.0.name: wordpress/ted-in-bed
1.0.description:
Curl up with your TEDdy bear and laptop and watch TED talks directly from your WordPress blog

Enable use of either TED talk URLs or [ted] short code.

Format for shortcode is [ted id=X height=Y width=Z] * id [required] - Can be found by clicking the 'Embed' button on the TED talks page * height [optional] - Desired height in pixels * width [optional] - Desired width in pixels
